name: WORD TOWER - Fun word puzzle
description:
Find the hidden words in mixed puzzle!
Collecting specific words and complete the collecting book that has variety themes!
Do not need to register to play and you can play without network connection!

*Use your brain and enjoy Epic game play!
Use your brain to solve puzzle!
Get excitement when you find the hidden words!
Find the words and improve your vocabulary skill!

*Anyone can easily play the game!
Easy words are placed in puzzle and anyone can find them!
Words can be vertical, horizontal and diagonal; find the words to clear the stage!

*So Simple!
Quick into the game play! Do not need to register and no other unnecessary steps!
Do NOT need network connection! Do NOT worry about your data package!
Able to enjoy the game in the plane!

*Simple and Beautiful game design
Enjoy simple and beautiful game design!
Variety of tower designs will give you more fun during the play!
